description: Enterprise techniques used by RIPTIDE, ATT&CK software S0003 v1.0
name: RIPTIDE (S0003)

techniques.comment: RIPTIDE is a RAT that communicates with HTTP.
APT12 has used RIPTIDE, a RAT that uses HTTP to communicate.
APT12 has used the RIPTIDE RAT, which communicates over HTTP with a payload encrypted with RC4.
